step.cmd: Click on "Draw" in the top left navigation of OneNote
Select a pen to write with
Write out a math problem that you wish to solve
Select the select tool a few spots left of the eraser (dotted circle with a plus mark)
With the select tool selected, draw a circle around the drawn math problem
Click the math button on the far right side of the draw toolbar
Click on "Select an action" and choose what you'd like to do with the math problem, and your answer will appear
